translation.en: [woman over radio] Someone is calling you home...
translation.ja: あなたを 家路へと導く声が…

translation.en: ♪ 'Cause it's another day For you and me in paradise ♪
translation.ja: ロサンゼルスへの道中

translation.en: -[man] Hey, what's up? -Code.
translation.ja: 〝人気俳優 ロイ･ハーダウェイ〞 〝人気俳優 ロイ･ハーダウェイ〞 もしもし 〝人気俳優 ロイ･ハーダウェイ〞 〝人気俳優 ロイ･ハーダウェイ〞 コード？

translation.en: -Yeah? -It's good to hear your voice.
Holy shit. Lisa?
translation.ja: マジかよ　リサなのか？

translation.en: Are you okay? I haven't heard from you in months. I was afraid you were dead.
translation.ja: 音沙汰なしだから 死んだかと思った

translation.en: [Lisa] I've been up in the woods working on that short film I told you about. Must have lost track of time.
translation.ja: 森で短編映画を撮ってて 時間の感覚がまひした

translation.en: Yeah. I know how you get. So you back in New York?
translation.ja: そうだったな ニューヨークに戻るのか？

translation.en: I'm an hour outside L.A.
translation.ja: 今 ロサンゼルスに

translation.en: Wait, what?
Do you know the name Lou Burke?
translation.ja: ルー･バークって 知ってる？

translation.en: Lou Burke? Yeah, of course I do.
translation.ja: もちろん知ってるよ 超有名人だぞ

translation.en: Apparently, he wants to meet with me.
Lis, that's huge.
Listen, I need a place to crash. Can I use your couch?
translation.ja: 寝る場所がないの ソファを使わせて

translation.en: Are you kidding? Yeah, of course. Anything you need.
translation.ja: もちろんだ　当たり前だろ

translation.en: I'm at 4837 Traction, downtown.
translation.ja: 住所は トラクション通り4837

translation.en: I knew I could count on you.
-I'm glad you're not dead. -Me too. See you soon, Code.
translation.ja: 無事でよかった ええ　じゃあ後でね

translation.en: ♪ I'm the one, natural one, make it easy ♪
[Lisa] How's your band doing?
-Heard you're selling drugs now, too. -Shh!
translation.ja: クスリも売ってるとか

translation.en: [whispering] Christine's asleep.
-Who the fuck is Christine? -My girlfriend. She lives here too.
translation.ja: 誰？ 同棲してる彼女だ

translation.en: Your-- Is she gonna mind me being here?
translation.ja: 私が泊まると嫌がらない？

translation.en: No, no, no. I mean...
-No, I'm sure it'll be fine. -[chuckles]
I mean, you get along with everybody, right?
You said, you'd never come to L.A.
translation.ja: ロサンゼルスには 来ないはずじゃ？

translation.en: Guess I changed my mind.
Your actress friend didn't wanna come?
Something happen in the woods?
You know. People tend to get fucked up around me.
translation.ja: みんな 私と関わると おかしくなる

translation.en: Not me.
You want this?
-Nah, I'm good. -Thank you.
-Night. -Goodnight.
-So you used to date my boyfriend. -I wouldn't say date exactly.
translation.ja: コードの元カノ？ 付き合ってたわけじゃ…

translation.en: It looked like you were sleeping with your eyes open. It was gross.
translation.ja: 目を開けたまま寝てた キモすぎ

translation.en: Sorry.
So he said you might need to crash here for a minute or so,
translation.ja: 少しの間 ここに泊まるんだって？

translation.en: and I'm totally good with that if you do.
Just... If you wanna take a shower,
translation.ja: それは別にいいけど シャワーは 廊下のバスルームを使って

translation.en: use the hallway bathroom, not the one by our bedroom.
translation.ja: シャワーは 廊下のバスルームを使って

translation.en: And sometimes when you pull the thingy for the shower,
translation.ja: 使う時は 出てこないかと思いきや⸺

translation.en: seems like nothing's gonna happen, and then it goes, like, ca-chunk!
translation.ja: 使う時は 出てこないかと思いきや⸺ いきなりバシャって出て…

translation.en: And then... Pssh! Like, it spits right in your eye.
translation.ja: いきなりバシャって出て… 目に直撃しちゃうからね

translation.en: Are you, like, an actress or something?
Filmmaker.
Good for you.
It's a very tough town.
It takes years just to get a break.
translation.ja: 売れるまで何年もかかる

translation.en: What do you do?
I'm in real estate.
Morning.
-[Christine] Hey, babe. [chuckles] -[Code] Hey.
Get off your butt, Lis. Don't you have that meeting with Lou Burke?
translation.ja: ルー･バークと 会う予定だろ？

translation.en: [Christine] Lou Burke?
[Lisa] Mr. Burke.
Lisa Nova.
Jesus, you're not much older than my son.
Sit. [clears throat]
And call me Lou. Never Mr. Burke.
translation.ja: 私のことはルーと呼んでくれ

translation.en: Okay. Lou. How'd you get my short film?
translation.ja: いいわ 私の作品の感想は？

translation.en: I sent it to a few people, but--
You know those nights you wake up every 20 minutes from a different dream?
translation.ja: 夢を見て 何度も起きることは？

translation.en: My wife thinks I should see a sleep guy, but I love my dreams.
translation.ja: 妻は心配するが 鳥の夢を見るのが好きでね

translation.en: I dream about the birds. Oh, hello. Thank you.
translation.ja: 妻は心配するが 鳥の夢を見るのが好きでね こっちだ

translation.en: Falcons, actually. I raise Arctic Peregrines. Like nature's 200-mile-an-hour missile.
translation.ja: ハヤブサを飼ってるが まさに自然界のミサイルだ

translation.en: I had three, but one killed Glenn Close's Pekingese,
translation.ja: グレン･クローズの犬に １羽 殺されたがね

translation.en: and now I've got two. Thank you.
translation.ja: グレン･クローズの犬に １羽 殺されたがね どうも

translation.en: You're having coffee with sushi.
I drink this coffee with everything. Comayagua!
translation.ja: いつもコーヒーだ コマヤグア！

translation.en: Ship it in from Honduras. My assistant makes sure my favorite spots have it on hand.
translation.ja: ホンジュラス産のコーヒーを 常備してる

translation.en: -Very cool. So-- -What's your story?
translation.ja: えっと… この辺りの人間じゃないな

translation.en: Not from L.A., I take it.
translation.ja: この辺りの人間じゃないな

translation.en: No, I'm from Brazil, actually.
translation.ja: ええ　出身はブラジルよ

translation.en: My father is a botanist. He was looking for corpse vines--
translation.ja: 父は植物学者で “死体のツル”を探して…

translation.en: I feel like you're flicking puzzle pieces at me.
translation.ja: おい 待ってくれよ “死体のツル”だって？

translation.en: -He was looking for a corpse vine? -What are we doing here?
translation.ja: おい 待ってくれよ “死体のツル”だって？ 一体 何のつもり？

translation.en: I wanted to meet you.
translation.ja: 君に会いたかったんだ

translation.en: That's how meetings work.
[in English] Japanese scallops.
[sighs] I saw a tape sitting on a desk and...
translation.ja: デスクの上に 君の作品が置いてあって…

translation.en: I don't know. I had this voice in my head.
translation.ja: なぜか分からないが 頭の中で声がした

translation.en: "Pick up this video tape.
Pick it up."
It's a true story.
That sound crazy? Probably does.
So you liked my movie.
[Lou] So, what do we got?
It's tense.
And scary.
And, um...
My God, that ending.
I mean, those special effects when she...
Well, I don't wanna get too gory over lunch.
translation.ja: 食事中に話すのは 気が進まないな

translation.en: So the question is what's the full-length,
translation.ja: 問題はあれを 長編映画にできるかだ

translation.en: major-motion-picture, opens-on-1500-screens-nationwide version?
translation.ja: 全米1500ヵ所で上映する 映画にするなら？

translation.en: Well, what it's really about, to me, is...
this woman.
She's got this thing. But she doesn't know how to use it yet.
translation.ja: 自分の能力の使い方を まだ知らない

translation.en: Like a superpower. Right? Her eyes already do that thing.
translation.ja: 超能力か？ 目で操ってただろ

translation.en: Yeah, but other people wanna take it from her.
translation.ja: その力を狙う人がいる

translation.en: They wanna suck her dry and don't care if they kill her in the process.
translation.ja: 力を得るためなら 彼女を殺す気よ

translation.en: So this woman, she has to learn how to use this thing against them.
translation.ja: だから彼女は能力を 使いこなす必要があるの

translation.en: If she wants to make it out alive.
-Okay. -It's a paranoid thriller.
translation.ja: なるほど “パラノイド･スリラー”よ

translation.en: Woman on the run. Right? I've been looking for something like this.
translation.ja: “逃げる女”か そういう作品を求めてた

translation.en: Okay, so let's do a director wish list. Right?
translation.ja: それじゃ希望する監督の リストを作ってくれ

translation.en: I'm directing.
Okay.
I mean, a rookie director is a tough sell.
translation.ja: 新人監督は なかなか厳しいぞ

translation.en: You'd have to sell yourself as a...
translation.ja: 評価してもらうのはな

translation.en: young female Cronenberg, uh...
translation.ja: 女性版クローネンバーグや ヴァーホーヴェンとして

translation.en: Verhoeven.
Truth is, I've been looking to take more chances.
translation.ja: 私も思いきって挑戦したいし

translation.en: You know, maybe you're the chance I've been looking to take.
translation.ja: 私も思いきって挑戦したいし 君の可能性に 懸けるべきなのかも

translation.en: But you need to learn to persuade people that you're the one to make this.
translation.ja: 監督を務めたいなら 人を説得する力を⸺ 身につけるべきだ

translation.en: So you'll help me out.
That's great.
And that's the thing. Not everything can be taught. Some things have to be experienced...
translation.ja: 教えられないこともある 経験から学ぶんだ

translation.en: Holy fucking shit. Roy Hardaway?
translation.ja: おい ロイ･ハーダウェイか？

translation.en: Is that Roy-fucking-Hardaway? Oh, my God! It is!
translation.ja: ウソだろ　本当に君なのか？

translation.en: -How's it going, Lou? Good to see you. -How the fuck are ya, huh?
translation.ja: やあ　ルー 調子はどうだ？

translation.en: Yeah. Oh, Roy, this is Lisa Nova. Lisa Nova, Roy Hardaway.
translation.ja: そうだ　彼女はリサ 彼は俳優の ロイ･ハーダウェイだよ

translation.en: The actor.
translation.ja: 彼は俳優の ロイ･ハーダウェイだよ

translation.en: I know who he is. Hi.
[Lou] You gotta try the monkfish liver. It's next-level.
translation.ja: ここの アンコウの肝はうまいぞ

translation.en: It's mind blowing, like having a woman undress in your mouth.
translation.ja: ここの アンコウの肝はうまいぞ きっと驚く

translation.en: Am I gonna see you at the Alvin Sender...?
translation.ja: アルヴィンのパーティーは？

translation.en: [Roy] Not sure yet. I haven't decided.
-[Roy] It was nice to meet you, Lisa. -Yes. You too.
translation.ja: リサ　またな ええ　会えてよかった

translation.en: So I'm assuming this is you?
Yes, that's me.
-You living out of this thing? -Actually, yes, I am.
translation.ja: 車上暮らしか？ ええ そうなの

translation.en: Jesus.
Home sweet home.
Tell you what.
I'm gonna option your short.
translation.ja: オプション契約を結ぶ

translation.en: We'll make the feature just the way you want it.
translation.ja: 君が望むとおりの 長編映画を作ろう

translation.en: Consider this a deposit.
I'll send over a contract. Have a lawyer look it over.
translation.ja: 契約書を送るから 弁護士に見せろ

translation.en: Okay.
-[engine starts] -Consider an apartment.
Why?
Do you want?
Oh, no, thank you. I'm not hungry, but thanks.
translation.ja: 結構よ　空腹じゃないの

translation.en: When the bandages come off, she'll look like Daryl Hannah.
translation.ja: 包帯が取れたら 絶世の美女になる

translation.en: Cher wasn't built in a day.
So is it legit?
Nothing seems shady.
You should get a lawyer.
[Lisa] I can't afford one.
Jules says it looks legit.
Well, if Jules Brandenberg says so.
I know what a contract looks like. I have a movie in development.
translation.ja: 俺も映画人だ 契約書は見慣れてる

translation.en: -He directed our video, babe. -Meaningless.
translation.ja: 監督もした だから何？

translation.en: You're gonna be huge, baby.
[mouths] Thank you.
Lou Burke. Wow.
translation.ja: ルー･バークか　すごい

translation.en: He hasn't had a hit in a few years, but I love Breaking Point.
translation.ja: 最近ヒット作はないが いい作品もある

translation.en: Good for you.
Thanks. So does the contract protect me as the director?
translation.ja: ありがとう その契約書があれば クビにされない？

translation.en: Can I be fired?
translation.ja: その契約書があれば クビにされない？

translation.en: No producer hires a director they can't replace if the director sucks.
translation.ja: 使えない奴は クビにされて当然だろ

translation.en: In theory, they could fire Steven Spielberg if they want to.
translation.ja: スピルバーグだって 例外じゃない

translation.en: But, yeah,
this says, you, Lisa Natasha Nova, are directing the movie.
translation.ja: この契約書には 君が監督だと明記されてる

translation.en: Just don't suck.
You think I could meet him?
[Christine] It's kind of a shithole, but you can't afford anything that isn't.
translation.ja: ひどい部屋だけど家賃は安い

translation.en: The great news is it's furnished. Or someone abandoned the furniture in here.
translation.ja: それに前の住人が置いてった 家具が残ってる

translation.en: But either way, you can use it.
I love this place.
Careful at night. There's coyotes all around here.
translation.ja: 夜はコヨーテが出るわよ

translation.en: -There's whats? -Coyotes.
They're fucking dangerous.
Feels kinda haunted. Maybe you'll hear some silent film actress sobbing all night.
translation.ja: ひと晩中 女優の すすり泣きが聞こえるかも

translation.en: Maybe she slit her wrists in the clawfoot tub.
translation.ja: 猫足の浴槽で 手首を切ったとか？

translation.en: [Christine] Not a clawfoot.
I always wanted a penthouse.
[Christine] The top floor of a walkup is not a penthouse.
translation.ja: ここはペントハウスとは 言わない

translation.en: [whispers] Coyotes.
[whispers] Coyotes.
[Lou] So let's talk about Lisa Nova.
translation.ja: じゃあ リサ･ノヴァ

translation.en: Can you sell me Lisa Nova?
You mean sell my movie idea?
No, actually, I don't. Everybody's got an idea.
translation.ja: 誰もがアイデアを持ってる

translation.en: There's only one you.
So who are you?
Sell yourself to me.
Okay.
So, I'm sure you hear this all the time, but I'm not like every other director.
translation.ja: 聞き飽きてると思うけど 私は他の監督とは違う

translation.en: Oh, you're not?
I witness a murder. Right?
I saw the guy. Got a good look at him. Now all the cops are standing around,
translation.ja: 警官たちに囲まれ 犯人の特徴を聞かれたよ

translation.en: the sketch artist has her pad and her pencils, and everyone's waiting with bated breath and I say,
translation.ja: 似顔絵担当者に向かって 私はこう言った

translation.en: "The killer was not like a jellyfish."
-Don't tell me what you're not. -Copy that.
translation.ja: もっと明確に 了解

translation.en: Don't worry, you're still young. We'll keep going until we get it right.
translation.ja: 準備ができたら連絡しろ

translation.en: ♪ Even the air in here has jelled ♪
translation.ja: “幼い頃から 映画が好きで…”

translation.en: -[Lou] You okay? You look tired. -[Lisa] I didn't get much sleep.
translation.ja: 眠そうだな 寝不足なの

translation.en: [Lou] Go again. Go.
I grew up loving movies.
translation.ja: 幼い頃から映画が好きで

translation.en: When I was a kid, in São Conrado, my dad had a projector,
translation.ja: 父が持ってた映写機で よく映画を見て…

translation.en: -and I used to watch-- -Let me tell you about a guy.
translation.ja: 父が持ってた映写機で よく映画を見て… 知ってるか？

translation.en: His name's Alvin Sender, and he's rich as sin.
translation.ja: 大金持ちの アルヴィン･センダーは

translation.en: What makes him unique is he loves finding new talent.
translation.ja: 才能ある新人を 発掘するのが好きでね

translation.en: You know the Sex, Lies, and Videotape kid? Alvin's financing his next project.
translation.ja: 最近も若い監督に 出資を決めたそうだ

translation.en: Problem is a lot of people ask Alvin for money.
translation.ja: 多くの人が 彼に出資を求めてる

translation.en: And believe me when I tell you, they all grew up loving movies.
translation.ja: その誰もが 幼い頃から映画ファンだ

translation.en: So, what makes you different?
translation.ja: 彼らと⸺ 君の違いは？

translation.en: Maybe I'm just not good at this whole pitching myself thing.
When I was a kid, I was in a really bad accident.
translation.ja: 私は幼い頃⸺ 大きな事故に遭った

translation.en: Stuck in a bed for the better part of a year.
translation.ja: ほぼ１年間 寝たきりで

translation.en: Worst part, I couldn't go to the movies.
translation.ja: 映画館に行けなくなったんだ

translation.en: And a movie theater was my church, it was everything to me.
translation.ja: 映画は私にとって すべてだった

translation.en: So I'd have to imagine the movies I wanted to see, beginning to end.
translation.ja: だからストーリーを 想像するしかなかった

translation.en: But to this day, I firmly believe
translation.ja: でも その事故に 遭ったからこそ

translation.en: that accident is the only reason I have three Oscars to polish.
translation.ja: でも その事故に 遭ったからこそ アカデミー賞に３回も輝いた

translation.en: Because I had a North Star.
Would that kid in that hospital bed wanna see this movie?
translation.ja: 病室にいた幼い私が 見たがるような映画だ

translation.en: That kid was my audience.
Who's yours?
Let's go for a drive.
What are you thinking about?
My mom.
What about her?
You asked who my audience is.
translation.ja: 観客が誰か聞いたでしょ

translation.en: [Lou] She must be an interesting lady.
[Lisa] I wouldn't know.
Never met her.
She left right after I was born.
translation.ja: 私を生んで すぐ消えた

translation.en: I know what I'm about to say is gonna sound crazy.
translation.ja: 妙だと思われるでしょうし

translation.en: Actually never said it out loud before but...
translation.ja: こんなこと言うのも初めて

translation.en: I feel like if I can make my film,
translation.ja: でも なぜか 私が撮った映画を

translation.en: somehow, she'll see it.
And she'll know it came from me.
That's beautiful.
You know, I could walk this into a studio a lot easier without you,
translation.ja: 正直なところ 君以外の監督を起用して⸺

translation.en: or take it to Alvin with some hotshot music video director,
translation.ja: 正直なところ 君以外の監督を起用して⸺ アルヴィンに 売り込みもできる

translation.en: but it's about relevance.
translation.ja: でも大事なのは信頼だ

translation.en: You know?
You only get so many bites at the apple. A year in this business is like a decade, and I haven't...
translation.ja: チャンスは無限に 転がってると言われるが…

translation.en: I haven't had a real hit since 1986.
translation.ja: 私は1986年から ヒット作なしだ

translation.en: I don't wanna know what it's like to disappear.
translation.ja: 業界から消えるのが怖い

translation.en: I need you.
That's the truth.
So Saturday night, Alvin Sender's having a thing at his gallery.
translation.ja: 土曜の夜 アルヴィン主催の パーティーがある

translation.en: Movie people, movie stars.
Be a great opportunity to meet Alvin.
It's a date.
[Lou] Well, this should be fun.
We're going as a team.
I'll build you up, get Alvin on your side. And then when you have the official meeting, he'll know who you are. Right?
translation.ja: アルヴィンに 君を売り込む場を設ける

translation.en: And then when you walk out of that meeting, you'll have a movie.
translation.ja: それが終われば 映画制作を開始できる

translation.en: Thanks.
Whatever happens, thanks for everything.
translation.ja: 結果がどうなろうとね

translation.en: [Lou] My pleasure.
I think we make a good team.
I'm sorry. I thought, um...
translation.ja: すまない　てっきり…

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I think we make a good team too.
translation.ja: 私たちは いいチームよ

translation.en: What's Alvin Sender look like?
[Lou] Like a rich guy.
You know, the masks read your brain waves and turn them into these little movies.
translation.ja: マスクで読み取った脳波を 映像化してる

translation.en: Stay here and look cool.
Bruce! Where the fuck did you get those cigarettes?
translation.ja: よお ブルース そのタバコどこで？

translation.en: [Roy] Lisa Nova.
Here you are.
This thing creeps me out.
I know it's bullshit, but I don't want the world to have a window into my mind.
translation.ja: 頭の中をのぞかれるなんて 俺はゴメンだね

translation.en: [Lisa] I love it.
What would somebody see if they looked through your window?
translation.ja: 君の頭をのぞくと 何が見えるのかな

translation.en: I guess it depends on who's looking.
You know that woman?
She's been watching you since you've walked in.
She's probably trying to figure out where you are in the food chain.
translation.ja: 君を品定めしてるのかも

translation.en: See you around, maybe.
I've been waiting for the right moment to say hello.
translation.ja: 話しかけるタイミングを 待ってた

translation.en: Do you know me?
The man you came in with is having a very important conversation without you.
translation.ja: お連れの男性が あなた抜きで話を進めてる

translation.en: Who are you?
I'm Boro.
What do you want?
To offer my services.
What is it you do?
For you? I could hurt someone.
translation.ja: 人を痛めつけてあげる

translation.en: How?
Will you hold my cat?
-Uh... -Here. Aww....
Okay, baby.
Sometimes, I imagine I'm inside him like he's a house.
translation.ja: この子の中に入ることを 想像するの

translation.en: You could do that.
Imagine you're inside someone. Say, the man you came here with.
translation.ja: 一緒に来た男性の中に 入ってみて

translation.en: -Inside of him? -Yes.
Imagine that.
Like he's a house and you're wandering around.
Are you doing it?
Yeah.
No. No, you're not.
Okay.
Imagine... that you're inside him.
translation.ja: 彼の中にいると 想像してみなさい

translation.en: You feel it?
Now, break something.
translation.ja: それじゃ 何か壊してみて

translation.en: Done.
-[cat meows] -Oh, yes. I know.
translation.ja: こちらにいらっしゃい

translation.en: I know.
Here.
I'm at Cortez and Maribel in Boyle Heights.
translation.ja: 用があれば⸺ コルテス通りと マリベル通りの交差点に

translation.en: Come find me. There's no number,
but you'll know it by the white jaguar out front.
translation.ja: 待ってるわ 白いジャガーが目印よ

translation.en: Bring my cat.
[Lisa] You just took it.
translation.ja: 猫は今 返したでしょ

translation.en: [Lou] I found Alvin.
Taking a piss next to me, can you believe it?
The john, man. Brings everybody together.
translation.ja: トイレは交流の場だからな

translation.en: -What happened? -Mm.
Craziest thing. We're talking, and all of a sudden, my nose starts gushing blood,
translation.ja: 不思議なことに話してたら 突然 鼻血が出てきたんだ

translation.en: like a faucet. And I haven't done blow since like '85.
translation.ja: コカインは 1985年以来 やってない

translation.en: I promised my wife. Thank you. [clears throat]
[Lisa] So, where is Alvin now?
Oh, he left. He was on his way out.
Oh, shit, he left. I didn't even get to--
translation.ja: まだ話してもないのに…

translation.en: Lisa, relax.
I talked to him. He's in.
translation.ja: 私が話すと 彼は乗り気だったよ

translation.en: What, just now? In the bathroom? Without watching the short?
translation.ja: 作品も見せてないのに 話を取り付けたの？

translation.en: My word's good for him.
Told you we make a great team.
And he knows I'm directing?
Lisa, Jesus!
translation.ja: リサ　勘弁してくれ

translation.en: What do you do when you get bad news?
It's good. He's in, I talked to him.
translation.ja: アルヴィンが 乗り気なんだから喜べよ

translation.en: You're welcome.
[Lisa] Why are we stopping?
I think your mother's gonna be proud of you.
translation.ja: 君の母親は喜ぶはずだ

translation.en: What? [grunts]
Nice.
Push in, push in, push in...
Cut.
Get off!
What? What's the problem?
translation.ja: おい どうしたんだ？

translation.en: Misread. [laughs]
You coming?
Like to walk. Okay. All right.
translation.ja: 歩きたいなら 好きにすればいい

translation.en: Enjoy the view.
Hi.
[Boro] Bring my cat.
Now, break something.
I could hurt someone.
Bring my cat.
[gasps] What the fuck! Code!
Jesus fucking Christ, you're like a fucking serial killer.
translation.ja: 殺人鬼みたいに 出てこないで

translation.en: I knocked. You didn't hear me? Your door was open.
translation.ja: ノックしたし 鍵が開いてた

translation.en: I just-- I wanted to see how you were doing with this whole...
Jules Brandenberg thing.
What Jules Brandenberg thing?
I mean, even he feels weird about it.
translation.ja: あいつも気まずそうだ

translation.en: What's he feel weird about?
Meeting with Lou.
What's he meeting with Lou for?
To direct your movie.
I thought you knew.
-He's expecting me. -[gasps]
Excuse me! Who are you?
Lisa.
Meet my son, Jonathan, the artist. He's taking a semester off.
translation.ja: 息子のジョナサンだ アーティストで 今は大学を休学中でね

translation.en: Uh... And this is my falcon, Maverick.
translation.ja: ハヤブサのマーヴェリックだ

translation.en: Do not mess with this guy. Look at that face. No sense of humor.
translation.ja: 冗談が通用しない奴だから 気をつけろよ

translation.en: Can we talk in private?
Yeah.
Why am I hearing that Jules Brandenberg is up to direct my film?
translation.ja: ジュールズを 監督に起用したの？

translation.en: Hey! I direct!
translation.ja: 監督は私がやるって 話だったでしょ

translation.en: -We talked about this! -You know precocial animals?
translation.ja: 監督は私がやるって 話だったでしょ 早成性の動物は…

translation.en: -What the fuck? -[Lou] Giraffes are an example.
translation.ja: 何？ 例えばキリンは 生まれた直後に立つ

translation.en: Right after they're born, they stand up.
translation.ja: 例えばキリンは 生まれた直後に立つ

translation.en: Covered in placenta and everything. They're all wet and wobbly. They don't know what walking is,
translation.ja: 胎盤にまみれた状態で 歩き方も知らないが

translation.en: but they're trying so damn hard to do it anyway.
translation.ja: どうにかして 立とうとするんだよ

translation.en: I'm not gonna give you the rights to my film if I'm not directing it.
translation.ja: 監督になれないなら 映画は渡さない

translation.en: Do you know what you signed?
No.
You don't know what you signed.
translation.ja: 知らずにサインしたんだろ

translation.en: Learn to walk before you try to run.
translation.ja: 走る前に歩き方を覚えろ

translation.en: You know? Remember, this is still a very big deal for you.
translation.ja: 十分 ありがたい話だろ

translation.en: We had an agreement.
We do have one. We signed it.
translation.ja: ああ　契約を結んだ

translation.en: Lou.
Sometimes, you want a filet mignon, and you get a Dodger Dog instead. But Dodger Dogs are delicious.
translation.ja: ステーキが欲しくても ホットドッグで満足すべきだ

translation.en: You made a promise.
I did make you a promise. And we do have an agreement.
translation.ja: 確かに約束したし 合意にも達したよな

translation.en: Have a seat.
Okay.
This business, this banquet
translation.ja: いいか　これは⸺ ビジネスなんだよ

translation.en: we're all feeding our bellies at,
translation.ja: 業界というパーティーは

translation.en: it's made up of promises and agreements.
translation.ja: 約束と合意で成り立ってる

translation.en: The problem is, you're still learning the difference between them.
translation.ja: まだ君は ２つの違いが分かってない

translation.en: And a promise is an hors d'oeuvre.
translation.ja: 約束は オードブルのようなものだ

translation.en: You know, it's an appetizer that gets passed around. "Bacon wrapped date? Thank you, I'd love one."
translation.ja: パーティーの最初に出てくる 前菜だよ

translation.en: Then we sit down for the main course. The meat.
translation.ja: その後 メインコースを食べる

translation.en: That's the agreement.
And you...
ate it.
What changed?
I'm not the bad guy.
I know you want me to be. I understand that.
translation.ja: 悪人に見えるだろうが

translation.en: But this world we live in is predators and prey.
translation.ja: この世界には 捕食者と獲物が存在する

translation.en: And each and every one of us is both.
translation.ja: 食うか食われるか どちらかだ

translation.en: Say it.
I gotta hear you say it.
What changed?
All right. And you're an artist, right? So it's all material. Use it.
translation.ja: 君という素材を使ったまでだ

translation.en: Maybe this is news to you, but art is violent, man.
translation.ja: 芸術の世界は 残酷で身勝手なものだ

translation.en: It's selfish. I mean, I-- I thought you knew that.
translation.ja: 君は知ってると思ってた

translation.en: "Written and directed by Lisa Nova."
translation.ja: “脚本兼監督 リサ･ノヴァ”？

translation.en: Are you gonna tell me you've never used anybody for the sake of making something?
translation.ja: 君だって誰かを 利用した経験はあるだろ

translation.en: That there's nobody out there who'd say, "Lisa Nova is selfish"?
translation.ja: 君のことを自己中心的だと 思う人もどこかにいる

translation.en: I wanna hear you say it.
What are you punishing me for?
I think we've said enough.
Is that your wife out there?
What's--? What's her name? I could talk to her.
translation.ja: 名前は？　彼女と話すわ

translation.en: Oh, you don't want me to talk to your wife.
Think.
Very carefully.
Let this be a learning experience.
translation.ja: いい勉強になったと 思えばいいさ

translation.en: [Lisa] You're gonna regret it.
[Lou] Lisa? Rewind!
I can't have you leaving here all upset.
translation.ja: そんな状態で帰せない

translation.en: I feel like I left the campsite in worse shape than I found it, which is a major Boy Scout no-no.
translation.ja: “来た時より美しく”が キャンプの鉄則だ

translation.en: What?
Look, there is a reality where you have a very long career.
translation.ja: 君のキャリアは まだ先が長いだろ

translation.en: Okay, but one of the skills you're going to need...
translation.ja: 君が身につけるべきなのは

translation.en: is the ability to apologize.
You want me to apologize to you?
You just came into my home uninvited.
translation.ja: 呼んでもないのに 押しかけてきて⸺

translation.en: And you threatened me.
You can't even admit you took my movie, because you're a fucking washed-up fucking--
translation.ja: 自分の実力で 結果を出せないからって…

translation.en: What did you say?
What am I? Say it again. Say it again.
You know what you are?
You're a fucking nothing. You're a million fucking wannabes.
translation.ja: お前に価値はない 無名の監督志望だ

translation.en: I see it every fucking day.
Bet your mother saw the same thing in you.
translation.ja: 母親も気づいてたはず

translation.en: Just a meaningless fucking void!
translation.ja: お前は 価値のない存在だってな

translation.en: Get the fuck out of my driveway before I call the cops.
translation.ja: 出ていかないと通報するぞ

translation.en: You said you could hurt someone for me.
translation.ja: 人を痛めつけられるって

translation.en: Is that true?
Where's my cat?
I didn't bring your cat.
Can you help me?
What did he do to you?
[Lisa] He betrayed me.
So what? It happens.
[Lisa] No.
He took the only thing I care about.
translation.ja: 大事なものを奪われた

translation.en: So...
Whatever it is you do,
I want you to do it.
translation.ja: 復讐(ふくしゅう)したい

translation.en: To him.
As long as you can pay my rate.
I'll pay you whatever you want.
[Boro] Great. I'll take the first payment upfront.
translation.ja: じゃあ初回は前払いね

translation.en: Do you know how special you are? Do you?
translation.ja: 自分が特別だって 気づいてる？

translation.en: You have something inside you.
translation.ja: あなたの中にあるものは⸺

translation.en: It's tasty.
It's always been there.
Your stuff, your substance.
translation.ja: ここに あるものが

translation.en: It's the beginning of all of your thoughts.
And it wants to be born.
You can keep the other cat.
Do we have a deal?
Say what you want.
Say it.
I want my movie back.
And I want to set his life on fire.
translation.ja: そして奴を地獄に落とす

translation.en: -[cat meows] -We can do that.
♪ But I want to know for sure ♪
translation.ja: 日本語字幕　上田 明子
